text:
#Chloroquine was not effective for #COVID19. 

This #Quinoline #neurotoxicant is in same antimalarial class as #mefloquine-which has adversely affected Military Operations globally. 

Learn more about #quinism @TheQuinismFdn or chat with @RemingtonNevin. 

See #MefloquineMassTort https://t.co/CNr42f1ToT https://t.co/f1ABTYq1Xt
